results.name: default/wordpress-deployment-66d874d745-cjd4v

error.Text: the last termination reason is Error container=mysql pod=wordpress-deployment-66d874d745-cjd4v

results.details:
Error: The MySQL container in the WordPress pod has terminated with an error.

Solution: 
1. Check MySQL container logs for errors: `kubectl logs wordpress-deployment-66d874d745-cjd4v -c mysql`.
2. Verify MySQL configuration and credentials.
3. Ensure sufficient resources and storage.
4. Restart the pod: `kubectl delete pod wordpress-deployment-66d874d745-cjd4v`.
